Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Kedzie/33rd
ShortDescription: Eastbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 31st, California and 35th, due to street blockage near Kedzie/33rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 31st, California and 35th, due to street blockage near Kedzie/33rd.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/33rd

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 31st, California, 35th and Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/33rd.
